main event: A civilian observed a round object, disc shaped, resembling a light bulb trailing smoke for 2-3 minutes on 7 November 1957.
interesting points: The object was sighted during conditions of thin broken cirrus and smoke in the area., The sighting occurred at a 45Â° elevation and varied azimuth angles., The object faded out after observation., The sighting was reported as possibly a balloon or aircraft., The observation was made visually from the ground.
sighted object: round disc-shaped object, size of a quarter
